data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
……Grass Wonder was certainly strong but, 
even so, Spe, you ran really well.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……Grass Wonder was certainly strong but, 
<story>even so, Spe, you ran really well.

data.text:
If you still want to challenge it, there's a way, 
or should we avoid the [Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe]……
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>If you still want to challenge it, there's a way, 
<story>or should we avoid the [Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe]……

data.text:
My condition was good, and I did a lot of training, 
I really used all of my strength to run.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>My condition was good, and I did a lot of training, 
<story>I really used all of my strength to run.

data.text:
……even with that she passed me, and pulled further and 
further away, I wasn't able to catch Grass-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>……even with that she passed me, and pulled further and 
<story>further away, I wasn't able to catch Grass-chan.

data.text:
……With the way I am now, even if I enter the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, 
there's definitely no way I can win.……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>……With the way I am now, even if I enter the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』, 
<story>there's definitely no way I can win.……

data.text:
In her mind, her dream of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" 
must be getting more vague―――
data.processed:
<story>In her mind, her dream of becoming "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" 
<story>must be getting more vague―――

data.text:
The reality that the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 was a huge 
challenge was becoming more clear, and this time's loss was a 
bigger shock than she expected.
data.processed:
<story>The reality that the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 was a huge 
<story>challenge was becoming more clear, and this time's loss was a 
<story>bigger shock than she expected.

data.text:
……Got it. In that case, let's change our approach. 
Focusing on domestic races also still has its merits.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……Got it. In that case, let's change our approach. 
<story>Focusing on domestic races also still has its merits.

data.text:
And then we'll properly observe the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』. 
It's a chance to get a good look at that stage, since it's not 
like you won't have a second chance.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And then we'll properly observe the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』. 
<story>It's a chance to get a good look at that stage, since it's not 
<story>like you won't have a second chance.

data.text:
And then we'll properly observe the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』. 
It's a chance to get a good look at that stage, since it's not 
like you won't have a second chance.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And then we'll properly observe the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』. 
<story>It's a chance to get a good look at that stage, since it's not 
<story>like you won't have a second chance.

data.text: ……Okay.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>……Okay.

data.text: Haa……Haaa……Haaa……Haaa……Haaaa!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Haa……Haaa……Haaa……Haaa……Haaaa!

data.text: Spuuuuuurtーー!!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Spuuuuuurtーー!!

data.text: Haa……Haaa……Huuu～……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Haa……Haaa……Huuu～……

data.text: (Ring! Ring!)
data.processed: <story>(Ring! Ring!)

data.text: Allo～!? Bonjouuuur!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Allo～!? Bonjouuuur!

data.text: 『Hello, El. Are you, perhaps, in the middle of training?』
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>『Hello, El. Are you, perhaps, in the middle of training?』

data.text: I was just about to take a break! My stomach is growling!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>I was just about to take a break! My stomach is growling!

data.text: 『Fufuu, I'm glad you sound fine』
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>『Fufuu, I'm glad you sound fine』

data.text:
Grass, good job at the 『Takarazuka Kinen』! 
The last straight was really astonishing, amazing, and exciting!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Grass, good job at the 『Takarazuka Kinen』! 
<story>The last straight was really astonishing, amazing, and exciting!

data.text:
It was really impactful, it makes me not want 
to lose to you and unable to stay still!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>It was really impactful, it makes me not want 
<story>to lose to you and unable to stay still!

data.text: 『Well, well, I'm honored you feel that way』
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>『Well, well, I'm honored you feel that way』

data.text:
Spe-chan and El, and everyone else, because they showed me their 
running, I was able to keep my dream in mind.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan and El, and everyone else, because they showed me their 
<story>running, I was able to keep my dream in mind.

data.text:
Someday, I'll repay this debt. 
My dream――by perfecting my run, and standing at the top.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Someday, I'll repay this debt. 
<story>My dream――by perfecting my run, and standing at the top.

data.text: 『Wow! As usual, you're burning with fighting spirit, huh!』
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>『Wow! As usual, you're burning with fighting spirit, huh!』

data.text: ……El too, it's almost time for you to challenge the strongest.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……El too, it's almost time for you to challenge the strongest.

data.text:
The 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 is only 3 months away, 
until then I'll keep on getting stronger!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>The 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 is only 3 months away, 
<story>until then I'll keep on getting stronger!

data.text: And then my dream――I'll prove that I'm the world's strongest!!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>And then my dream――I'll prove that I'm the world's strongest!!

data.text:
『……If you're in that condition, then you'll 
be able to give it your all it seems』
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>『……If you're in that condition, then you'll 
<story>be able to give it your all it seems』

data.text: My all, is it――
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>My all, is it――

data.text:
Everyone! For seeing me off I'm thankful, 
inspired, and filled with emotion!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Everyone! For seeing me off I'm thankful, 
<story>inspired, and filled with emotion!

data.text: Are you really okay with us not going with you to the airport?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Are you really okay with us not going with you to the airport?

data.text:
Bueno! Isn't today a weekday? 
Everyone needs to go study properly!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Bueno! Isn't today a weekday? 
<story>Everyone needs to go study properly!

data.text:
Leave it to me! I'll study enough for El-chan, 
and I'll liven up Japan's races enough for El's part too!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Leave it to me! I'll study enough for El-chan, 
<story>and I'll liven up Japan's races enough for El's part too!

data.text:
Having a classmate that's challenging the 
world, it kind of makes me proud too.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Having a classmate that's challenging the 
<story>world, it kind of makes me proud too.

data.text:
I'm looking forward to hearing the news about your exploits. 
I'll show you that my exploits can reach even France!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>I'm looking forward to hearing the news about your exploits. 
<story>I'll show you that my exploits can reach even France!

data.text: Ehehe, I'll do my best!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Ehehe, I'll do my best!

data.text: Alright, in that case……I need to get going……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Alright, in that case……I need to get going……

data.text: Really……I need to get going……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Really……I need to get going……

data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: ……El, you still have a little bit more time left, don't you?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……El, you still have a little bit more time left, don't you?

data.text: Que……?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Que……?

data.text: Fufuu, in that case, to cheer you up――
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, in that case, to cheer you up――

data.text: What the heck is this～～!?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>What the heck is this～～!?

data.text:
Like I said, it's to cheer you up～ 
Alright, face forward and focus, okay?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Like I said, it's to cheer you up～ 
<story>Alright, face forward and focus, okay?

data.text:
So this is how we're sending her off, is it? 
Fufuu, how interesting!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>So this is how we're sending her off, is it? 
<story>Fufuu, how interesting!

data.text:
Allllright! We'll send her off with all we've got!! 
Uooooooooooh～～～～!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Allllright! We'll send her off with all we've got!! 
<story>Uooooooooooh～～～～!

data.text: Me too! Daaaaaaa～～!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Me too! Daaaaaaa～～!

data.text: Oh～ oh～, things are heating up, huh～?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Oh～ oh～, things are heating up, huh～?

data.text: Wait, wait!? Are we running for real!?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Wait, wait!? Are we running for real!?

data.text: Haaa……haaa……El, please show us.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Haaa……haaa……El, please show us.

data.text: The run of someone aiming for world's strongest, show us……!
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>The run of someone aiming for world's strongest, show us……!

data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>……！

data.text:
……El is an Uma Musume aiming for world's strongest……! 
Something like hesitating is……!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>……El is an Uma Musume aiming for world's strongest……! 
<story>Something like hesitating is……!

data.text: Just watch me! Yaaaaaaa～～～～!!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Just watch me! Yaaaaaaa～～～～!!

data.text:
……I left all my worries back in Japan. The 『Prix de l'Arc de 
Triomphe』, I'll be challenging it with all my strength!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>……I left all my worries back in Japan. The 『Prix de l'Arc de 
<story>Triomphe』, I'll be challenging it with all my strength!

data.text: 『Yes, make sure to show me a grand performance』
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>『Yes, make sure to show me a grand performance』

data.text:
『And after that……I'm looking forward 
to running a race with that El♪』
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>『And after that……I'm looking forward 
<story>to running a race with that El♪』

data.text: Ehehe, yeah!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Ehehe, yeah!

data.text:
Finally, the day that the Japanese Uma Musume, El Condor Pasa, 
challenges those at the world's apex has arrived.
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Finally, the day that the Japanese Uma Musume, El Condor Pasa, 
<story>challenges those at the world's apex has arrived.

data.text:
Of course she's being cheered on through the broadcast, 
but here in France the voice of 2000 supporters 
can be heard pushing her forward.
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Of course she's being cheered on through the broadcast, 
<story>but here in France the voice of 2000 supporters 
<story>can be heard pushing her forward.

data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
El Condor Pasa, will she be the first to accomplish this 
historic feat that no other Japanese Uma Musume has so far?
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>El Condor Pasa, will she be the first to accomplish this 
<story>historic feat that no other Japanese Uma Musume has so far?

data.text:
(……My dream, to prove that I'm the 
world's strongest on this stage……)
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>(……My dream, to prove that I'm the 
<story>world's strongest on this stage……)

data.text:
And here, the Uma Musume who has garnered 
the most attention enters the paddock!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>And here, the Uma Musume who has garnered 
<story>the most attention enters the paddock!

data.text:
Until now out of 7 races, 6 wins and one 2nd place finish! 
Called France's strongest, Montjeu, makes her appearance!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Until now out of 7 races, 6 wins and one 2nd place finish! 
<story>Called France's strongest, Montjeu, makes her appearance!

data.text: ……Fuu.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story>……Fuu.

data.text: Montjeu……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Montjeu……

data.text:
El Condor Pasa, I'm well aware of your accomplishments. And that 
after a long campaign, you've come to try and win this race too.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>El Condor Pasa, I'm well aware of your accomplishments. And that 
<story>after a long campaign, you've come to try and win this race too.

data.text:
The true strength of Japan's Uma Musume, 
by all means show it to me here.
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed:
<story>The true strength of Japan's Uma Musume, 
<story>by all means show it to me here.

data.text: You don't need to tell me, I'll show you more than that……!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>You don't need to tell me, I'll show you more than that……!

data.text: <Let's both have a good race>
data.name: Montjeu
data.processed: <story><Let's both have a good race>

data.text:
The world's most prominent race, the 『Prix de l'Arc de 
Triomphe』…… against other world class Uma Musume, and France's 
strongest, Montjeu……
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>The world's most prominent race, the 『Prix de l'Arc de 
<story>Triomphe』…… against other world class Uma Musume, and France's 
<story>strongest, Montjeu……

data.text:
The stage is set. I've done my best, and will bring all my 
strength to bear, for my dream――to be the world's strongest!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>The stage is set. I've done my best, and will bring all my 
<story>strength to bear, for my dream――to be the world's strongest!

data.text:
Will Japan's El Condor Pasa be the first to defeat the world's 
strongest opponents, including Montjeu, and grasp victory!?
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Will Japan's El Condor Pasa be the first to defeat the world's 
<story>strongest opponents, including Montjeu, and grasp victory!?

data.text:
Finally, the Uma Musume leave the paddock and head 
towards the stage of the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』……!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Finally, the Uma Musume leave the paddock and head 
<story>towards the stage of the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』……!

title: The Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe
